- Using BIRT 2.2 M4 build
- I have not changed the eclipse default vm max size while starting the eclipse env.
- Created a BIRT Web project and added a report design to it
- View the report using viewer.( VIew Report -> Viewer/HTML )
- Problem is inconsistent.

But eventually the BIRT designer exits with out of memory errors.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 172636 ***
